item.title: CVE
item.description: score:119 Chances: Higher downstream throughput and better production margins contribute to profit. Positive adjusted funds flow and free funds flow in the second quarter. Planned turnaround and production impacts in May and June due to maintenance. Strong cash generation from operating activities. Improvement in sustainability performance and methane reduction milestone.
